timeline.bodyText: I think a better way is to create a service and encapsulate the API call. Maybe just student-profile-service
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: I realize there is already  a student-profile.service.ts file under services. Should I create this method under the service?
replies.author: tiuweehan

timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: I think only if the statusCode is 404 then you should return  null
timeline.author: xpdavid
xpdavid

timeline.bodyText:
Any reason why we don't combine pipe together into one block?
.pipe(
    catchError()
    flatMap()
    catchError()
    xxxx
)
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: I previously thought that catchError was a 'catch all' function for pipe, but looks like it is not the case. I will make the changes, thanks for pointing it out!
replies.author: tiuweehan

timeline.bodyText: The error message format is for the convenient of which handler?
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: It is for the response object of type ErrorMessageOutput in line 150
replies.author: tiuweehan

replies.bodyText: It should not be an error as users just dismiss the modal?
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: That makes a lot more sense, will do!
replies.author: tiuweehan

replies.bodyText:
I can't find a clean way to terminate a pipe in RxJs, so in the new implementation I have passed null down the pipe to indicate that the user didn't upload any picture.
Would it be better to throw an error when the user does not upload any picture, but not display the error message to the user? Or is there a better alternative.
replies.author: tiuweehan

replies.bodyText:
Would it be better to throw an error when the user does not upload any picture, but not display the error message to the user?

I think so.
replies.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Looks like you master the rxjs pipe. Great job!
timeline.author: xpdavid

  [#9918] Remove HttpRequestService dependency from StudentListComponent (#9927)
  [#9921] Don't load all courses again when deleting/archiving courses in InstructorCoursesPageComponent (#9923)
Migrate profile picture methods to student profile service
Refactor to throw error when image not uploaded

timeline.bodyText: Though personally I think it is OK to use string literal here. Depends on how you want to standardize this. Either use it for all API call or not use it.
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: Ok I'll change it back and standardize it in a later PR
replies.author: tiuweehan
